snippet: The attorney general said he was willing to turn over some documents about the operation known as “Fast and Furious.”
abstract: Attorney Gen Eric H Holder Jr announces that he is willing to partially comply with a subpoena for documents from the Justice Department about the gun-trafficking operation known as 'Fast and Furious'; department will hand over documents about how officials in Washington learned of the facts surrounding the failed operation.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general said he was willing to turn over some documents about the operation known as “Fast and Furious.”

headline.main: Holder to Comply in Part With Gun Inquiry Request
headline.print_headline: Holder to Comply in Part With Gun Inquiry Request

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
